text: IF YOU ARE HUNGRY DONT COME! The first food we ordered came after 56mins. The next dishes came after 1hr + waiting. Food is cold. Fish is uncooked. Nasi goreng gila is tasty but can taste bits of the salt once in every 2-3 feed.Yuck. Ayam gunting they sprinkle chilli flakes without asking first. Crispy chicken burgerâ€™s fries is so pale and taste weird. Looks like they put it in the air fryer instead of frying it in the actual oil. Chicken satay is good but only get it after all of the other meal is at the very last bite. OVERPRICE, LONG WAITING, NOISY. Dont get the hype. Very very not worth the time and money
The place was nice, but the food was very pricey. I wouldnâ€™t mind if it was delicious, but unfortunately, it was quite disappointing. ðŸ˜”
Nice views,many varieties of food mostly indonesia dishes.Bakso rindu regular  and shawarma chicken less meat  tasteless .Only oxtail soup meets our expectations.

Chill and cozy place to dine in. Child friendly.
Freeflow of keropok and a variety of sambal.
Food taste authentic. Nasi ambeng sambal paru was a tad too spicy for me. Nasi goreng was nice. Penang kway teow was also great. Free flow of dessert (porridge) on fridays.
Downside is no washroom in restaurant.
We ordered their egg plant as recommended, it was rather good, however we were told their gado gado isn't spicy but it was burning. Had to return & got a replacement. The view is great though!
